content.rendered:
Frost Flower Varsity Jacket

The Frost Flower Varsity Jacket represents the pinnacle of craftsmanship and style, seamlessly blending premium materials and meticulous design. Crafted from a blend of 100% cowhide leather, satin, original wool, cotton, polyester, spandex, and nylon, this jacket embodies luxury and durability in every stitch.

Design and Style

Embodying the distinctive Frost Flower style, this jacket is a testament to contemporary fashion. Its enduring appeal is characterized by intricate embellishments, including modern HD sublimation and customized embroidery patches, elevating its aesthetic allure to new heights.

Quality and Durability

Designed to withstand the test of time, the Frost Flower Varsity Jacket boasts unparalleled durability. Its blend of materials ensures longevity, fade-resistance, and enduring style, making it a timeless addition to any wardrobe. From the clean and even seams to the quality finishing touches, every aspect exudes meticulous attention to detail.

Customization and Versatility

With customization options ranging from labeling and branding to color selection, the Frost Flower Varsity Jacket offers unparalleled versatility. Available in sizes ranging from S to 3XL, and with customization options tailored to individual preferences, this jacket caters to diverse tastes and styles, ensuring a perfect fit for every wearer.

excerpt.rendered:
A perfect addition to your wholesale collection for discerning customers seeking distinctive style

  • Durability : longevity| Fade- resistance | enduring style
  • Embellishment : Modern HD sublimation & Customized Embroidery patch
  • Print Options : Overall
  • Customization : Labeling & branding on demand
  • Color : Any/On demand
  • Finishing : Clean & Even seams with quality finishing
  • Sizes : S to 3XL (Available on demand)
  • MOQ : 20
